justification: The study evaluates the relevance and validity of frailty screening tools in the context of longevity research. Frailty is a key concept in gerontology and aging research, directly impacting lifespan and healthspan. The validation of assessment tools contributes to the understanding of biological processes related to longevity.
key_terms: frailty assessment, PRISMA-7, Clinical Frailty Scale, Fried criteria, Short Physical Performance Battery
